Boya Guo is a second year graduate student at Columbia University. She is pursuing a Master of Public Health degree in the [Department of Epidemiology](https://www.mailman.columbia.edu/become-student/departments/epidemiology), at Mailman School of Public Health. She graduated from Emory Univeristy in 2017 with a Bachelor of Sciences degree in [Biology](http://www.biology.emory.edu/) and a Bachelor of Arts degree in [Human Health](http://s165322.gridserver.com/wordpress/curriculum/human-health-major/). She is interested in cancer epidemiology research and dedicated to continue her research path in breast cancer and nutrition.

On this website, you will find Boya's [experience/resume](about.html) and [research projects](research.html). 

You can find Boya on [GitHub](https://github.com/boyaguo), and [linkedin](https://www.linkedin.com/in/boyaguo/). Reach out to her by sending an email at boya.guo@columbia.edu.

Click [this] (plot_ly.html) link to see the plotly interactive graphics created for HW4 Problem 2. The graphs were based on the [NY NOAA](http://p8105.com/dataset_noaa.html)  dataset.
